entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
